verses.verse: And <S%G2532><s%> Jesus <S%G1525>entered<s%> and passed <S%G1330>through<s%> <S%G2410>Jericho.<s%>

And, <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2400>behold,<s%> there was a <S%G435>man<s%> <S%G3686>named<s%> <S%G2564><s%> <S%G2195>Zacchaeus,<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G846>which<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> the chief among the <S%G754>publicans,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3778>he<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G4145>rich.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G2212>sought<s%> to <S%G1492>see<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5101>who<s%> he <S%G2076>was;<s%> <S%G2076>and<s%> <S%G1410>could<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G575>for<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3793>press,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> he <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G3398>little<s%> of <S%G2244>stature.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G4390>ran<s%> <S%G1715>before,<s%> and climbed <S%G305>up<s%> <S%G1909>into<s%> a sycamore <S%G4809>tree<s%> <S%G2443>to<s%> <S%G1492>see<s%> <S%G846>him:<s%> <S%G3754>for<s%> he <S%G3195>was<s%> to <S%G1330>pass<s%> <S%G1565>that<s%> way.

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G5613>when<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1909>to<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5117>place,<s%> he looked <S%G308>up,<s%> and <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> Zacchaeus, <S%G2195><s%> make <S%G4692>haste,<s%> and come <S%G2597>down;<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G4594>today<s%> <S%G3165>I<s%> <S%G1163>must<s%> <S%G3306>abide<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> house. <S%G3624><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> he made <S%G4692>haste,<s%> and came <S%G2597>down,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5264>received<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G5463>joyfully.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> when they <S%G1492>saw<s%> it, they <S%G537>all<s%> <S%G1234>murmured,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G3754>That<s%> he was <S%G1525>gone<s%> to be <S%G2647>guest<s%> <S%G3844>with<s%> a <S%G435>man<s%> that is a <S%G268>sinner.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G2195>Zacchaeus<s%> <S%G2476>stood,<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2962>Lord;<s%> <S%G2400>Behold,<s%> <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2255>half<s%> of <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G5224>goods<s%> I <S%G1325>give<s%> to <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4434>poor;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> I have taken any thing from any man by false <S%G4811>accusation,<s%> <S%G5100><s%> <S%G5100><s%> I <S%G591>restore<s%> him <S%G5073>fourfold.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> This <S%G4594>day<s%> is <S%G4991>salvation<s%> <S%G1096>come<s%> to <S%G5129>this<s%> <S%G3624>house<s%> forsomuch <S%G2530>as<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> a <S%G5207>son<s%> of Abraham. <S%G11><s%>
For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>man<s%> is <S%G2064>come<s%> to <S%G2212>seek<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G4982>save<s%> that which was lost. <S%G622><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> as <S%G846>they<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> these <S%G5023>things,<s%> he <S%G4369>added<s%> and <S%G2036>spake<s%> a <S%G3850>parable,<s%> because <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G1511>was<s%> nigh <S%G1451>to<s%> <S%G2419>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> because <S%G846>they<s%> <S%G1380>thought<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3195>should<s%> <S%G3916>immediately<s%> <S%G398>appear.<s%>

He <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G3767>therefore,<s%> A <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G2104>noble<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G4198>went<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> a <S%G3117>far<s%> <S%G5561>country<s%> to <S%G2983>receive<s%> for <S%G1438>himself<s%> a <S%G932>kingdom,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to return. <S%G5290><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> he <S%G2564>called<s%> <S%G1438>his<s%> <S%G1176>ten<s%> <S%G1401>servants,<s%> and <S%G1325>delivered<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G1176>ten<s%> <S%G3414>pounds,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G4231>Occupy<s%> <S%G2193>till<s%> I come. <S%G2064><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4177>citizens<s%> <S%G3404>hated<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G649>sent<s%> a <S%G4242>message<s%> <S%G3694>after<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> We will <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2309>have<s%> <S%G5126>this<s%> man to <S%G936>reign<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> us. <S%G2248><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> it came to <S%G1096>pass,<s%> that when <S%G846>he<s%> was <S%G1880>returned,<s%> having <S%G2983>received<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G932>kingdom,<s%> <S%G2532>then<s%> he <S%G2036>commanded<s%> <S%G5128>these<s%> <S%G1401>servants<s%> to be <S%G5455>called<s%> unto <S%G848>him,<s%> to <S%G3739>whom<s%> he had <S%G1325>given<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G694>money,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> he might <S%G1097>know<s%> how <S%G5101>much<s%> every <S%G5100>man<s%> had gained by trading. <S%G1281><s%>

Then <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3854>came<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4413>first,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G3414>pound<s%> hath <S%G4333>gained<s%> <S%G1176>ten<s%> pounds. <S%G3414><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2095>Well,<s%> thou <S%G18>good<s%> servant: <S%G1401><s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> thou hast <S%G1096>been<s%> <S%G4103>faithful<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> a very <S%G1646>little,<s%> have <S%G2468><s%> <S%G2192><s%> thou <S%G1849>authority<s%> <S%G1883>over<s%> <S%G1176>ten<s%> cities. <S%G4172><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1208>second<s%> <S%G2064>came,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G3414>pound<s%> hath <S%G4160>gained<s%> <S%G4002>five<s%> pounds. <S%G3414><s%>
And <S%G1161><s%> he <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G2532>likewise<s%> to <S%G5129>him,<s%> <S%G1096>Be<s%> <S%G4771>thou<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1883>over<s%> <S%G4002>five<s%> cities. <S%G4172><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2087>another<s%> <S%G2064>came,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G2400>behold,<s%> here is <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G3414>pound,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> I <S%G2192>have<s%> kept laid <S%G606>up<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> a napkin: <S%G4676><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> I <S%G5399>feared<s%> <S%G4571>thee,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> thou <S%G1488>art<s%> an <S%G840>austere<s%> man: <S%G444><s%> thou takest <S%G142>up<s%> <S%G3739>that<s%> thou laidst not down, <S%G5087><s%> <S%G3756><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2325>reapest<s%> <S%G3739>that<s%> thou didst <S%G3756>not<s%> sow. <S%G4687><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> he <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G1537>Out<s%> of thine <S%G4675>own<s%> <S%G4750>mouth<s%> will I <S%G2919>judge<s%> <S%G4571>thee,<s%> thou <S%G4190>wicked<s%> <S%G1401>servant.<s%> Thou <S%G1492>knewest<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G1510>was<s%> an <S%G840>austere<s%> <S%G444>man,<s%> taking <S%G142>up<s%> <S%G3739>that<s%> I laid not down, <S%G5087><s%> <S%G3756><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2325>reaping<s%> <S%G3739>that<s%> I did <S%G3756>not<s%> sow: <S%G4687><s%>

Wherefore <S%G1302><s%> <S%G2532>then<s%> <S%G1325>gavest<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> thou <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G694>money<s%> <S%G1909>into<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5132>bank,<s%> <S%G2532>that<s%> at <S%G1473>my<s%> <S%G2064>coming<s%> I might have required <S%G4238><s%> <S%G302><s%> mine <S%G846>own<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> usury? <S%G5110><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G2036>said<s%> unto them that stood <S%G3936>by,<s%> <S%G142>Take<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3414>pound,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1325>give<s%> it to him that <S%G2192>hath<s%> <S%G1176>ten<s%> pounds. <S%G3414><s%>
(And <S%G2532><s%> they <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> he <S%G2192>hath<s%> <S%G1176>ten<s%> pounds.) <S%G3414><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> unto <S%G5213>you,<s%> <S%G3754>That<s%> unto every <S%G3956>one<s%> which <S%G2192>hath<s%> shall be <S%G1325>given;<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> him that <S%G2192>hath<s%> <S%G3361>not,<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G3739>that<s%> he <S%G2192>hath<s%> shall be taken <S%G142>away<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

But <S%G4133><s%> <S%G1565>those<s%> <S%G3450>mine<s%> <S%G2190>enemies,<s%> which <S%G2309>would<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> that <S%G3165>I<s%> should <S%G936>reign<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G71>bring<s%> <S%G5602>hither,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2695>slay<s%> them <S%G1715>before<s%> me. <S%G3450><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> when he had <S%G5023>thus<s%> <S%G2036>spoken,<s%> he <S%G4198>went<s%> <S%G1715>before,<s%> ascending <S%G305>up<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2414>Jerusalem.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> it came to <S%G1096>pass,<s%> <S%G5613>when<s%> he was come <S%G1448>nigh<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G967>Bethphage<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G963>Bethany,<s%> <S%G4314>at<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3735>mount<s%> <S%G2564>called<s%> the mount of <S%G1636>Olives,<s%> he <S%G649>sent<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> of <S%G848>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples,<s%>

Saying, <S%G2036><s%> Go <S%G5217><s%> ye <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2968>village<s%> over <S%G2713>against<s%> you; <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3739>which<s%> at your <S%G1531>entering<s%> ye shall <S%G2147>find<s%> a <S%G4454>colt<s%> <S%G1210>tied,<s%> whereon <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3739><s%> yet never <S%G4455><s%> <S%G3762><s%> man <S%G444><s%> sat: <S%G2523><s%> <S%G3089>loose<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> and <S%G71>bring<s%> him hither.

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> any <S%G5100>man<s%> <S%G2065>ask<s%> <S%G5209>you,<s%> <S%G1302>Why<s%> do ye <S%G3089>loose<s%> him? <S%G3779>thus<s%> shall ye <S%G2046>say<s%> unto <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G3754>Because<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2192>hath<s%> <S%G5532>need<s%> of him. <S%G846><s%>
And <S%G1161><s%> they that were <S%G649>sent<s%> went their <S%G565>way,<s%> and <S%G2147>found<s%> even <S%G2531>as<s%> he had <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>them.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> as <S%G846>they<s%> were <S%G3089>loosing<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4454>colt,<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2962>owners<s%> <S%G846>thereof<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G5101>Why<s%> <S%G3089>loose<s%> ye <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4454>colt?<s%>
And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588>they<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G3588>The<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2192>hath<s%> <S%G5532>need<s%> of <S%G846>him.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> they <S%G71>brought<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus:<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G1977>cast<s%> <S%G1438>their<s%> <S%G2440>garments<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4454>colt,<s%> and they set Jesus <S%G1913>thereon.<s%> <S%G2424><s%>
And <S%G1161><s%> as <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G4198>went,<s%> they <S%G5291>spread<s%> <S%G848>their<s%> <S%G2440>clothes<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3598>way.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G846>he<s%> was come <S%G1448>nigh,<s%> even <S%G2235>now<s%> <S%G4314>at<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2600>descent<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3735>mount<s%> of <S%G1636>Olives,<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G537>whole<s%> <S%G4128>multitude<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G756>began<s%> to <S%G5463>rejoice<s%> and <S%G134>praise<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> with a <S%G3173>loud<s%> <S%G5456>voice<s%> <S%G4012>for<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the mighty <S%G1411>works<s%> <S%G3739>that<s%> they had <S%G1492>seen;<s%>

saying, <S%G3004><s%> <S%G2127>Blessed<s%> be <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G935>King<s%> that <S%G2064>cometh<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3686>name<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord:<s%> <S%G1515>peace<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1391>glory<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G5310>highest.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> among <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3793>multitude<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G1320>Master,<s%> <S%G2008>rebuke<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G3101>disciples.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>them,<s%> I <S%G3004>tell<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G3754>that,<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> should hold their <S%G4623>peace,<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3037>stones<s%> would immediately cry out. <S%G2896><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G5613>when<s%> he was come <S%G1448>near,<s%> he <S%G1492>beheld<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4172>city,<s%> and <S%G2799>wept<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> <S%G846>it,<s%>
